name: Gabe Newell Simulator 2.0
description: In Gabe Newell Simulator you can manage Steam releasing and creating new games and also in the story mode you can play as Gaben and help him in his fight against other software house, talk with his employees and decide the fate of Half Life 3!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.2 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible

reviews.review_text: If I'm being honest, this game is worth far more than the 3 dollar price tag. You can actually PLAY the game, and it has steam trading cards, which will allow you to earn some interesting emoticons/backgrounds. The kickass remix on the title screen is all I needed to get hyped.  Although this game is obviously a joke, I've still had quite a lot of fun already and don't regret buying it. I'm sure you won't either, as it only costs you the lunch money your parents gave you. This game stays in your library forever, whereas the food you bought at the cafetaria only lasts for a couple hours.  All hail our lord and savior of vidya, GabeN! (PS: my favorite class is the pie)
Cause it bought this game i got a dlore in cs

Look, I really enjoyed this game. I played through it, and honestly I couldn't stop myself from reccomending it to everyone.   Don't listen to the others; they're all negative nancies. Trust your inner-greed, that overwhelming lust and succumb to GabeN's holy presense.   While yes, Gabe Newell Simulator is a game, it is trully an expierence that any loyal follower of GabeN's should try out.   7.9/10 = worth the wait.
A Gabe Newell Parody Shooter

Gaben Simulator is just one of those weird games on steam that you might just buy for novelty like NotGTAV or Shower with your dad simulator, I'd say only get it if you have a few bucks left in your steam wallet
Rates: 9/11   Would release Half Life 3 again like Gaben should  I acquired Frontal Lobe Cancer from the story mode
I got this from a bundle!   Oh, Gabe...

GABEN TAKE MY MONEY AND SHUT UP!!          Edit : This definetly is the best game ever.  Pros : BEST GRAPHICS 10/10  BEST TITLE SONG EVUR 21/10   BEST BUTT EVER 10/10  SO MUCH SWAGG 333/10  Overall rating 1/10  Cons : 2 much moneyz for my wallet but who gives a ♥♥♥♥ about that.
Someone brought it for me so I didnt have to buy this steaming pile of ♥♥♥♥

Gaben Newell Simulator 2.0 is a great game,  It runs very smoothly and has brilliant graphics.The lore and storyline of this game is very detailed and should be given great praise.It has brilliant mechanics and is very playable.  It's an example of a great thirdperson shooter and should be a good impression on future thirdperson shooters as well.

I Would have not recomended this gane for its dodgy controls but i tried the game and i could control it.  Good things about this game:  -Its a orignal idea -Has a mini game called steam mode -The developer followed the path of what most people wanted -Good Graphics   Things that needs to be worked on:  -Steam mode is glitchy -Not much ammo -Dodgy controls   Above all its a good game.
This game helped me in hard times and is just fantastic!  Made me understand the meaning of life...       pls kill me
SImple, and entertaining. Not for those who can't overlook graphics, however.
I only have 1 question: How can any of this be legal...on Valve's own store no less?          YouTube™ Video:  GABE NEWELL SIMULATOR - Steam Is A Literal Joke Now
i spent £1 just to tell you how BAD THIS MEME IS

Not funny - this game is empty, has no jokes.  The beginning level has an NPC with about 5 sentences text-dialogue and that's all the fun you can get. There's also the final room (which you can enter from the menu without beating the game) with only a computer and you can decide if you want to release or delete hl3, there will be adequate video ending played.  Betwen these there are 5 levels where nothing happens, you run through same empty corridors, passing same enemies (they run even slower than Gaben, shooting in this game is pointless).  Oh and there is Portal DLC: 3 levels, in the end you reach a cake and nothing happens, ESC doesn't work, you have to ALT+F4. So rewarding.  Played almost an hour, still haven't received one trading card.
It's... well it's pretty awful. As would be expected. Don't buy it, you'll get tetanus
At first i didn't know how to play,then knew an obvious truth on me: Life is but a span.
i thought i could play it and mess around as a joke.... and i regret my decision i should have listend to the warnings please do not buy this game listen to the warnings.

You know when you back up your car and hit your cat, killing it by squishing it's organs to pulp? THIS GAME LAUGHS AT YOUR SUFFERING AND EXECUTES YOUR PARENTS. GABEN WANTS YOUR MONEY, AND WILL TAKE IT FROM YOU. GabeN's model looks like a untextured Fat Albert model from the PSX era, the enemies come straight at you and instantly kill Newell, and the gun barely works. I shut down this pile of ♥♥♥♥, then refunded it. DO NOT BUY, MAKE GABEN POOR!
I GET IN THE RING AND I START EATIN' GARBAGE (This Game) Funny but 3 dollars is pushing it.

Sounds like a funny concept, right? Well.. The problem is that it's just not the least bit entertaining. What actually seems worse than the fact that I wasted $2 on this is that it's taking up space in my library now.
Seriously. ♥♥♥♥ this game.
It has many bugs...DONT BUY IT!!!
This game is really bad just don't buy it
You have things that are so bad they're good, and then you have things like this 'game', so bad it's just.. bad. Theres nothing good about this.   5/7, belongs on consoles
Loved the idea, hated the development.
Was gifted this and even I feel robbed, Im astounded by how quickly I can get stuck in something just by getting attacked by an enemy
absolut trash.
